title: Poor Jenny, Bright as a Penny
description: Fifteen-year-old Jenny Middle struggles to hold her family together despite poverty, constant moves, the jail sentence and drunkenness of her mother, and a sister tragically involved with drugs.The title has been changed to UNSETTLED on the ebook edition, issued in 2011. This timeless story of growing up forty years ago will be as relevant and moving to girls of today as it was to those who read it when first published.
author: Shirley Rousseau Murphy
